ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainTotalValueTooLarge
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The total value #totalValue# of the order is greater than the maximum value #maxValue# of the Order template.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the total value is larger than the value speficied in the template.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainTotalValueTooSmall
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The total value #totalValue# of the Order is lesser than the minimum value #minValue# of the Order template.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the total value is less than the value speficied in the template.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainProductItemMetaNotUnique
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The product(s) #summary# has/have been assigned more than once using the same item template.
ValidationMessage.comment: Product with same item template and quantity logistic unit can only exist once.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoCommitDateGreaterDeliveryDate
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The Order date must be lesser than or equal to delivery date.
ValidationMessage.comment: DeliveryDate must be greater than CommitDate.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainDeliveryDateTooLarge
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please choose a delivery date during the next #days# days.
ValidationMessage.comment: DeliveryDate must be smaller than defined in template.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainDeliveryDateTooSmall
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Choose a delivery date that is at least #days# workdays in the future.
ValidationMessage.comment: DeliveryDate must be larger than defined in template.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainDeliveryDateSaturday
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The selected delivery date is a Saturday. Delivery is not allowed on Saturdays.
ValidationMessage.comment: Delivery date is not allowed on Saturdays.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainDeliveryDateSunday
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The selected delivery date is a Sunday. Delivery is not allowed on Sundays.
ValidationMessage.comment: Delivery date is not allowed on Sundays.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainNoWorkDay
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The selected delivery date is not a workday.
ValidationMessage.comment: Delivery date is only allowed on workdays.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMainNoBrokerAssignment
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please assign a wholesaler.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMandatoryFields
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please assign a delivery recipient.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsQuota
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The quota for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s). Please reduce the quantity for this product.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsQuotaWarning
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The quota for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s).

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsUserInventory
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The user inventory for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s). Please reduce the quantity for this product.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsUserInventoryWarning
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The user inventory for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s).

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsQuotaSummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The quota for some products are overdrawn: #summary#. Please reduce the quantity for the products.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsQuotaWarningSummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The quota for some products are overdrawn: #summary#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsUserInventorySummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The user inventory for some products are overdrawn: #summary#. Please reduce the quantity for the products.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoOrderQuantityExceedsUserInventoryWarningSummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The user inventory for some products are overdrawn: #summary#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please fill in all values.
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoQuantityExceedsMaxQuantity
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The entered quantity #quantity# of #item# exceeds the defined max quantity #maxQuantity#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoQuantityExceedsMaxQuantitySummary
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Ordered quantity is more than the allowed quantity for the product #summary#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasCalculationSchemaNotfound
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Calculation Schema could not be determined.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoCpMandatoryConditionMissing
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Calculation failed - No condition found for mandatory calculation step #step# and product #product#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoNoModReasonEnteredAfterEdit
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The product(s) #summary# has/have beed modified, please provide the reason for the modification.
ValidationMessage.comment: Product is modified without a reason

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoDeliveryDateNull
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter the delivery date.

ValidationMessage.name: CasCheckPaymentCollected
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please confirm payment collected.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoCheckEmptyPaymentMethod
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: For collecting the order payment, a payment method needs to be specified.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoNoPPPLicense
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You don't have the required permission to use the penny perfect pricing feature. Contact your salesforce administrator.
ValidationMessage.comment: PPP license needed to calculate orders

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyApprovalValidation
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter the approval reason before submitting.
ValidationMessage.comment: Approval Reason needed before submitting for approval.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please calculate order before submission.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMySplitOrderMinValueValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Your split has below the minimum split value for Split #splitNo# of #minValue# Euros.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMySplitOrderOnlyFreeGoodsValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You can't submit because free good-only splits are not allowed. Please add some standard items on split #splitNo#.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMySplitOrderPreSaleMinQuantityValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please fulfil minimum split quantity for Split #splitNo# of #minQuantity# SKUs. Do you still want to submit?

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderQuantityValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Quantity is not compliant with Multiple.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderQuotaLimitValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You do not have enough available quota. Please enter a total quantity up to #remainingQuota# or contact your manager.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyExchangeOrderGlobalQuotaLimitValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The maximum quota for #productName# has been reached, please go back and choose another product.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyExchangeOrderQuotaLimitValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You do not have enough available quota. Please enter a Total Exchange Value up to #remainingQuota# € or contact your manager.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyExchangeOrderValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Exchange value must be between #lower#€ and #higher#€. Please adjust.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyPreSalesMinQtyValidation
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please fulfil minimum split quantity for Split #splitNo# of #minQty# SKUs or #minValue# value.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyAskSubmitForApproval
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Do you still want to submit? If you click on Yes, the order will be Sent for approval.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyPreSalesQtyValueDeviation
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: PreSales Split Mandatory qty/value deviation.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderSplitValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please provide a BillTo and ShipTo for all splits and specify a Wholesaler for transfer splits before submitting.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderEmptyTenderCodeValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: This order requires a valid Tender Number. Submitting without it will require Area Manager approval.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderMonitoredCustomerMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The selected customer is flagged for monitoring and the respective order will need to be approved by an Area Manager.

ValidationMessage.name: CasOrderNoProcessExchangeValid
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: To take an Exchange Order, first you need to have a #processExchangeValue# Split under this Order.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoMyOrderPastSplitDatesValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You can't submit a order with split dates in the past. Please review and submit again.
